an4.109:4.1: * “Cattārome, bhikkhave, rukkhā.
an4.109:4.3: Pheggu phegguparivāro, pheggu sāraparivāro, sāro phegguparivāro, sāro sāraparivāro—
an4.109:4.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro rukkhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.109:4.7: Pheggu phegguparivāro, pheggu sāraparivāro, sāro phegguparivāro, sāro sāraparivāro.
an4.109:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivāro?
an4.109:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo;
an4.109:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivāro.
an4.109:5.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu phegguparivāro;
an4.109:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti sāraparivāro?
an4.109:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo;
an4.109:6.3: parisā ca khvassa hoti sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā.
an4.109:6.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti sāraparivāro.
an4.109:6.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu sāraparivāro;
an4.109:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti phegguparivāro?
an4.109:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo;
an4.109:7.3: parisā ca khvassa hoti dussīlā pāpadhammā.
an4.109:7.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti phegguparivāro.
an4.109:7.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho sāro phegguparivāro;
an4.109:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti sāraparivāro?
an4.109:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo;
an4.109:8.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti sāraparivāro.
an4.109:8.5: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho sāro sāraparivāro;
an4.109:8.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro rukkhūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
